mapper.select: SELECT accountId, id, date, description, amount FROM transactionTable
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transactionTable (accountId, id, date, description, amount) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{id}, #{date}, #{description}, #{amount})
mapper.update: UPDATE transactionTable SET accountId = #{accountId}, id = #{id}, date = #{date}, description = #{description}, amount = #{amount} WHERE id = #{id}
